title: PLEASE NERF DIANA!!!
body:
In the last time, i had some pretty good games, but not because we won every time. They were good because i understood the diffrences between the enemy team and me and could relate, because of my actions and stats, why they could kill me or else. But i had one game we lost completely. I played midlane as Yasuo (No, im not a toxic Yasuo ONLY kid, i like other champs as well) against Diana. Not only did she get me half life lvl 3, but ONESHOTED me lvl 6 full hp with ignite. I mostly accept riots decisions about Character design, but this is ... .

Diana isnt the most played champ, and you cant even ban her in champselect, cause there is most of the time way more champs that you would ban first...

Please think about this
